tasks.label: ADB: Live log (cmd, tee-like)
tasks.command: cmd /c "adb logcat -c && adb logcat -v time | powershell -NoLogo -NoProfile -Command \"Tee-Object -FilePath .\\logcat_full.txt\""

tasks.label: ADB: Live log (PowerShell tee)
tasks.command: pwsh -NoLogo -NoProfile -Command "adb logcat -c; adb logcat -v time | Tee-Object -FilePath .\logcat_full.txt"

tasks.label: ADB: Reset server
tasks.command: cmd /c "adb kill-server && adb start-server && adb devices"
